title: What is the difference between flat 50% off vs upto 50% off? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the first case, all goods will be sold at half price. In the second case, different items may have 10%, 20%, and so on, off not exceeding 50% off. The ones in the last category will, usually not be to your liking. Just a marketing gimmick to get people to visit the store.
Flat 50% off means you get 50% discount Upto 50% means the discount can be anywhere between 0 to 50% Few items might be 50 % and most items the discount is much less.
